original_text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord, which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh;
korean_text: 그의 아들에 관하여 말하면 육신으로는 다윗의 혈통에서 나셨고

sentences.original_text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 예수 그리스도 우리 주에 관하여는

sentences.original_text: which was made of the seed of David
